sentence.Network_en: You are a vision of loveliness.
The loveliness of the scene was beyond compare.
Beauty also -- her type of loveliness -- and yet she was lonely.
sentence.Network_cn: 她还有她那种类型的 美貌,可她却感到寂寞.

PerfectNetExp.abs: “可爱”的英文怎么说？ -翻译-教育-天涯问答 ... Clarice 有名的 ... loveliness 可爱 all because of u 全因有你.
以l开头的英语英文单词 ... loveless 无爱情的,不可爱的 loveliness 可爱,美丽,魅力 lovely 可爱的；好看的.

list.abs: You look lovelier than your pictures ., 你本人比照片漂亮.
love is a union of loveliness with truth ., 爱情是可爱与真实的结合.
may you keep loveliness and charm ., 祝你永葆青春魅力.
increasing teaching loveliness by using information technique ., 运用信息技术增加教学魅力.

entry.def: If you describe someone or something as lovely, you mean that they are very beautiful and therefore pleasing to look at or listen to.

example.tran: 你看上去真漂亮，马西娅。

entry.def: If you describe something as lovely, you mean that it gives you pleasure.

example.ex: Mary! How lovely to see you!...
example.tran: 玛丽，见到你真是太高兴了！

entry.tran: 亲切和善的；心地善良的
entry.def: If you describe someone as lovely, you mean that they are friendly, kind, or generous.

example.ex: Laura is a lovely young woman...
example.tran: 劳拉是个亲切友好的姑娘。
她是个心地善良的孩子。

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of being good looking and attractive

auth_sentence.content: Weber's solo tracks reveal an ear for sonic loveliness.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Weber's solo tracks reveal an ear for sonic loveliness.

auth_sentence.content: Ekaterina Borchenko's dancing personified grace and loveliness as the Queen of the Dryads.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ekaterina Borchenko's dancing personified grace and loveliness as the Queen of the Dryads.

auth_sentence.content: A thing of beauty is a joy for ever; Its loveliness increases: it will never Pass into nothingness.
auth_sentence.res_content: A thing of beauty is a joy for ever; Its loveliness increases: it will never Pass into nothingness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A thing of beauty is a joy for ever; Its loveliness increases: it will never Pass into nothingness.

sentences.en: The loveliness of the scene was beyond compare.
